fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Culture, Education and training, Energy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: European Commission Annual Work Programmes 2018-2020. Commenting the drafts through Finland's National Contact Points and Committee Members, especially the ICT Work Programme. FP 9 preparation monitoring and impact on the future framework programme via various channels. H2020 Mid term review statement, European Innovation Council statement, European Defence Fund, FP9 etc.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
Mission - Shaping the future: science and art together with technology and business 
We are building competitive edge by combining knowledge from different disciplines to identify and solve complex challenges, and to educate future visionaries and experts. 
 
Vision - An innovative society 
Breakthrough discoveries deeply integrated with design and business thinking enable systemic solutions and accelerate innovation. 
 
Values 
Passion for exploration 
Courage to influence and excel 
Freedom to be creative and critical 
Responsibility to accept, care and inspire 
Integrity, openness and equality 
 
Strategic objectives 
Research and innovation: Research excellence for academic and societal impact 
Art and creative practices: Renewing society by art, creativity and design 
Education: Educating game changers 
Campus: Transforming our campus into a unique collaboration hub 
Enablers of our academic mission: Excellence in advancing and supporting our core goals
relevant_communication:
Participation in FET Flagships Graphene and HBP 
 
Participation in EIT KICs: Digital (co-location centre), Raw Materials (co-location centre) and Climate
